Prestige Hospitality IPO:Prestige's hotel arm, Prestige Hospitality Ventures Ltd, filed a Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) with SEBI on April 24, 2025, to raise up to ₹2,700 crore through an IPO. This includes a ₹1,700 crore fresh issue and a ₹1,000 crore offer-for-sale. The funds raised will be used to pay down debt and finance new hotel developments.

Entry into NCR and Ghaziabad Project:Prestige Group entered the Delhi-NCR residential market with a significant project in Ghaziabad. The company plans to invest ₹10,000 crore in a 62-acre township project there. They aim for a Gross Development Value (GDV) of ₹12,000 crore for the entire township. This move aims to bring integrated living (homes, retail, and green areas) to Ghaziabad under the Prestige banner for the first time.

Upcoming Project Launches (FY26):Prestige plans to double its residential launches in the fiscal year 2026 (FY26), targeting cities like Bangalore, Mumbai, Hyderabad, and Delhi-NCR. They aim to launch as many as 25 residential projects with a developable area of 44.8 million sq ft and an estimated GDV of ₹42,120 crore.

Strong Q4 FY25 Sales:The group reported robust sales in the fourth quarter of FY25, delivering 14 million sq ft of homes with a GDV of ₹16,133.8 crore. However, their annual sales bookings for FY25 decreased by 19% to ₹17,023 crore due to delays in regulatory approvals.

Investment Plans in Maharashtra:Prestige Group signed MOUs to invest ₹12,500 crore in developing a data center, a global competency center (GCC), and a logistics center near Navi Mumbai. This plan also includes building residential and commercial facilities around these projects, creating 8,700 direct jobs.

Q4 FY25 Financials (as of May 30, 2025):Prestige Estates Projects Ltd reported a significant decline in profit for Q4 FY25, with net profit down 81.91% YoY. Revenue also saw a decrease of 28.81% YoY. However, sales bookings in Q4 FY25 surged by 48% YoY to ₹6957.4 crore.

Prestige Evergreen Launch (EOI stage):Prestige Evergreen, part of Prestige Raintree Park Phase 2 in Bangalore, opened for Expression of Interest (EOI) bookings in May 2025. This allows early buyers to potentially save up to 9% on the final price.

Here's a summary of the latest news and updates related to the Prestige Group as of May 1, 2025:

In summary, as of May 1, 2025, Prestige Group was actively pursuing an IPO for its hospitality venture, expanding into the NCR real estate market with a major project in Ghaziabad, and planning for a significant increase in residential project launches in the upcoming fiscal year, despite facing some setbacks in sales bookings in the previous year due to approval delays.
